spec.name: La Nationale Building
spec.description: The La Nationale Building (Immeuble La Nationale) is a historical residential and commercial building completed between 1930 and 1931. It was designed by architects **Xavier Rendu and R. Ponsard**. The building exemplifies the Art Deco and early Modernist styles that characterized Casablanca's downtown area, featuring multi-story units and often decorative architectural elements. These buildings defined the city's commercial and residential boom during the French Protectorate.

timeline.title: Building Completed
timeline.description: The La Nationale Building was completed.

access.comment: Building is inhabited; exterior view is public, interior access is restricted to residents/tenants.
